sentences.english: Then, I viewed the deformation of Folk Xiake-legend to Revolutionary Hero-legend by way of prototype thinks.
sentences.chinese: 民間俠客傳奇正是英雄原型能動地參與現實的結果。

sentences.english: It emphasizes the swordman's social significance and his social value to dispel violence.
sentences.chinese: 通過強調俠客的社會意義和社會價值來消解暴力。

sentences.english: A swashbuckler who uses agility and guile to stand toe-to-toe with enemies.
sentences.chinese: 一個用敏捷和貼身技能去與敵人周旋的俠客。

sentences.english: A lively and melodious music genre displays a chivalrous man's free and heroic character.
sentences.chinese: 輕快悠揚的曲風，表現出俠客灑脫豪邁的性格。

sentences.english: It is loyal to maintain network world free equal chivalrous person while being chivalrous while being competent if another is but.
sentences.chinese: 另一套卻是，仗義行俠維護網絡世界自由平等的俠客。

definition: (of an uneducated person) to mingle with the cognoscenti/to pose as a culture lover/to be a culture snob/having pretensions to culture
brocade garments, jade meals (idiom); a life of luxury/extravagance
greedy for life, afraid of death (idiom); craven and cowardly/clinging abjectly to life/only interested in saving one's neck
to talk idly about important matters (idiom)/to set the world to rights/to pass judgment on everything
